name: Mega Man Battle Network (Wii U)
description:
In a future where everyone owns a personal exploration terminal--PET for
short--convenience is at your fingertips. With PETs, humankind is
connected to a network that allows instant communication and handling of
every day needs. But with the latest upgrades, network viruses have also
flourished.

Lan and his extraordinary network navigator MEGA MAN.EXE are skilled
computer operators who hack into the expansive network world and battle
network crime. Join the adventure as they face the mysterious criminal
organization called World Three (WWW), and fight off an assortment of
hackers and viruses in real time. Collect Battle Chips that contain
valuable weapons and critical system data that will help with upcoming
battles. Get ready for an adventure of virus-busting proportions!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
